product.title: Jiangsu Streets Stores Set 2 Building Sets
product.body_html:
• Description
  • FAQ
  • Shipping

  • Experience the life of running your Own Favorite Jiangsu Street Stores 2

    The Jiangsu is well known for producing silk and, during the Tang and Song dynasties, it was the center of silk production. This continued into the Ming and Qing dynasties. Now you have the opportunity to experience the life of being a Jiangsu Street Stores Manager Set 2, with its other friendly store owners on Jiangsu street.


    🌸 Measurements: about 3x3x6in / 8x8x15cm
    🌸 Compatible with leading blocks of standard size (16mm)
    🌸 Each set has over 250 pieces
    📦 Excludes original box to protect the environment. For further details please see below.*

    We have picked another fantastic set of 4 cute Jiangsu street shops for you to build, role play, and learn how to run a Jiangsu street store in your own room.     This is the perfect crafty gift for your loved ones!

    Please note: All building sets do not come with the original box to protect our environment, they do come in their own original separate bags. For further details please see below.*

     

    Our first cute Jiangsu street store set 2 is the Dragon Well 西湖龙井 store, it selling the famous green tea. With the exquisite details as shown. It contains 354 pieces.

    Our second cute Jiangsu street store is Suzhou Silk Store. In the Xia Dynasty, Suzhou had already produce Color Mosaic silks which named “Zhi Bei”. Silk is shiny, lustrous, soft yet strong, it can be beautifully and brilliantly dyed. The history of Chinese silk stretches back more than 2,000 years. Silk is a delicately woven product made from the protein fibers of the silkworm cocoon. Silk production is a lengthy process that requires close monitoring. With the exquisite details as shown. It contains 286 pieces.

    Our third cute Jiangsu street store is Antique Shop, With thousands of years of history, antique Chinese decorative arts from ceramics, to metalwork, hard stones and scholar art. Shop Qing and Ming dynasty porcelains, Song dynasty stoneware, and early pottery from the Tang and Han dynasties and Neolithic cultures, an Antique store is a must for any town..  With the exquisite details as shown. It contains 291 pieces.

     

    Our final cute Jiangsu street store is the Pawnshop. In those days, life was tough, so many people had to sell their things to a shop called pawnshop for money. We have these pawnshops at our local stores such as old electronic games or old mobiles. With the exquisite details as shown. It contains 330 pieces.

    You can buy all 4 as a set, totaling a massive 1217 pieces to start your own Jiangsu street stores Set 2. Each set can be connected as shown below

    Our building sets are a challenging task for all ages, but still achievable to complete by following the instruction booklets.

    The perfect gift for those who love their crafts!

    You will love seeing your family and friends in excitement when they receive our building blocks, leaving an everlasting smile on your loved ones by surprising them with these super innovative and cool building blocks today.

    * Our Building Block sets are packaged in safe and secured protective bags. They do NOT come in the original box to reduce the carbon footprint, save the planet and reduce postage cost on your behalf. It will come with all the pieces and a detailed instruction booklet for you to follow along. 

    Standard Blocks: These blocks are compatible with other famous brands.

    Features

    🏛 100% premium quality (ABS) plastic
    🏛 Sharp brilliant colors and solid feel
    🏛 Challenging and rewarding to stimulate all brains
    🏛 High-quality durable non-toxic green material

    WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD - Contain small parts; not suitable for children under 6 years old unless there is adult supervision.


  • Do you ship worldwide? Yes, we ship to over 300 countries and proud to provide free shipping to the United States, the United Kingdom, Australia, New Zealand, and many countries in Europe.

    What are the blocks made from?     All our building blocks are manufactured from a High-Quality Premium strong, resilient plastic known as acrylonitrile butadiene styrene (ABS) and will stand the test of time and provide hours of fun building their own creations

    Does this help with stress and development?     Our building blocks are a great way to relieve stress and engage in meaningful and joyful conversations. As children comment on their building creations, they develop important communication skills including the ability to explain ideas, describe their work, talk about the process and verbalize challenges that they had along the way. 

    Are these compatible with other leading brands? Yes, these are traditional/standard-sized blocks so they are compatible with other leading brands. 

    CHOKING HAZARD: Small parts. Not for children under 6 years old

     

  • We are proud to offer FREE tracked shipping to over 300 countries worldwide including the United States, Canada, United Kingdom, Australia, New Zealand, Germany, France, Italy, Austria, Netherlands, and many others. If you are wondering if we ship to your country please head over to our Shipping Policy.

    Packaging time: 1-3 Business days

    Shipping time: Est 5-30 Business days
